PHRASE.LANG: This wheelbarrow full of exciting and colorful flowers is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Coming Up Roses Award" for owning the game and being one of 3 or more people to win at once. [#Legal]

Cette brouette pleine de fleurs intéressantes et coloré est une récompense de "A Day At The Races" article course de chevaux. C'est le "Coming Up Roses Award" pour posséder le jeu et d'être l'une des 3 personnes ou plus à gagner à la fois. [#Legal]

This wheelbarrow full of exciting and colorful flowers is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Coming Up Roses Award" for owning the game and being one of 3 or more people to win at once. [#Legal]
